message: Let's split fairly, Bob. I get a bit more now, you get to make a counter-offer next.
Your turn to be generous, Alice.  I'll take the slightly larger share this time.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. This is a fair deal considering the inflation.

Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it or leave it.
